      • saveState

        public static boolean saveState(java.util.ArrayList<Auction> state)
        Saves the passed in state object to a file for later use
        Parameters:
        state - The array list that holds all of the current auctions that the server is hosting
        Returns:
        Returns true if the file is saved to the disk false if not

      • loadState

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Auction> loadState()
        Attempts to load the server state from the file
        Returns:
        Returns the ArrayList containing the auctions if the file exists or null if not
